text: 🚨 New Report Reveals Shocking Truth About Healthcare in America! 🤯 According to PayZen's Healthcare Affordability Report, 36% of Americans have skipped necessary medical care due to the inability to pay! 😱 The report also shows that 75% of respondents worry about affording unexpected medical bills. 💸🤔 It's unacceptable that in a country as wealthy as ours, people are forced to choose between their health and financial stability. 💪 It's time for us to demand better from our lawmakers and ensure everyone has access to affordable, quality healthcare! 🏥� Fighting for a future where no one has to go broke because of medical bills!
